headline: Warren Buffett Doubled His Position in These 2 Stocks Last Quarter. Should You Invest in Them?
summary: Buffett's company, Berkshire Hathaway, significantly increased its position in both Constellation Brands and Pool Corp last quarter.  Warren Buffett's company Berkshire Hathaway (NYSE: BRK.A)(NYSE: BRK.B) recently filed its latest 13F report, showing which stocks it has a position in.
